API¶

Base Classes¶

class cba.base.Component(id=None, attributes=None, css_class=None, handler=None, initial_components=None, *args, **kwargs)¶

Base class of all components.

attributes
HTML attributes of the component. A dictonary with attribute name, value pairs, e.g. {“style”: “color:red”}
css_class
The css class of the component. A string.
id
The unique id of the component. This must be unique troughout the whole application. If the id is not given a UUID4 based id is created automatically.
handler

A dictonary with events and handler methods, e.g.:

handlers = {
    "click": "server:handle_save",
    "change": "client:my_js_function",
}

The events could be any javascript event. The handler could be a method of the component instance which has “catched” the event or one of it’s parent components (handler with the prefix server) or a javascript method ( handler with the prefix client).

initial_components
The initial sub components of this component.
parent
The parent component of the component. This is set automically Only the root component has a parent of None.
template
The path to the template which is used to render the component.
remove_after_render
If true the component is removed from the component tree after it has been rendered.
add_component(component)¶

Adds the given component as sub component to the current component.

component
The component which is added to the current component
add_message(message, type='info')¶

Adds a message. All messages are displayed to the user after the current request has been returned to the browser.

clear()¶

Clears the component. Can be overriden by sub classes to clear specific values.

components¶

Returns all direct child components of the current component as list.

get_component(id, direct_only=False, with_root=True)¶

Returns the component with the passed id.

Starts the search within the sub components of this component (but see also with_root).

id
The unique id of the component which should be returned.
direct_only
If set to True only the direct sub components of this component are taken into account. Otherwise all child components of the component sub tree will be taken into account.
with_root
If true a second search is started with root as base.
get_from_session(key, default=None)¶

Gets a value from the session.

key
The key under which the value has been saved. When the key doesn’t exist the method returns default.
default
The value the method returns if key is not existing.
get_request()¶

Returns the current request.

get_root()¶

Returns the root component.

get_user()¶

Returns the current user.

init_components()¶

Can be overriden to set the initial sub components of the current components.

is_root()¶

Returns True if the component is the root component.

refresh()¶

Rerenders the current component once the current request is returned to the browser.

refresh_all()¶

Refresh the component and reloads the initial sub components.

remove_component(id)¶

Removes a component from sub components of the current component. Returns True when it was successfully, otherwise False.

id
The id of the component which should be removed.
render()¶

Renders the current component as HTML.

replace_component(id, component)¶

Replaces a component with another.

id
The id of the component which should be replaced.
component
The component which should replace the removed one.
set_to_session(key, value)¶

Saves a value to the session.

key
The key under which the value is saved.
value
The value to be saved.
class cba.views.CBAView(**kwargs)¶

The default base class.

All views of an cba application should be inherit from this class.

Default Components¶

class cba.components.Button(value='', *args, **kwargs)¶

A HTML button.

value
The value of the button.
class cba.components.Group(id=None, attributes=None, css_class=None, handler=None, initial_components=None, *args, **kwargs)¶

A simple group component to arrange compontens together. For instance for styling reasons or to easier refresh its sub components.

class cba.components.HiddenInput(value='', *args, **kwargs)¶

A HTML hidden input field.

value
The value of the hidden input field.
class cba.components.HTML(handler=None, tag='div', text='', *args, **kwargs)¶

A HTML tag.

tag
The outer tag of the component.
text
The text of the component. Will be rendered within the outer tag.
class cba.components.Image(src='', alt='', title='', *args, **kwargs)¶

A HTML image component.

alt
The content alt tag of the image file.
src
The url to the image file.
title
The content of the title tag of the image.
class cba.components.Link(handler=None, text='', *args, **kwargs)¶

A HTML link.

handler
The method which is called when the button is clicked.
text
The content of the HTML tag.
class cba.components.Menu(direction='horizonal', *args, **kwargs)¶

The root container of a pop up menu.

direction
The direction of the menu. One of vertical or horizonal.
class cba.components.MenuItem(handler=None, href=None, label=None, name='', *args, **kwargs)¶

An item a menu.

handler
The method which is called when the button is clicked.
href
Optional URL the item links to.
label
Optional label of the menu item.
name
The name of the menu item. This is displayed to the user.
class cba.components.ConfirmModal(event_id, handler, header=None, text=None, *args, **kwargs)¶

A convenient modal dialog with a yes and no button. When the dialog is answered with yes the handler method is called via an ajax request.

event_id
The event_id which is passed to the backend when the dialog has been approved.
handler
The method which is called when the dialog has been approved.
header
The header of the dialog which is displayed to the user.
text
The text of the dialog which is displayed to the user.
class cba.components.Select(id, label=None, value=None, options=None, multiple=False, *args, **kwargs)¶

A HTML Select box.

label
An optional label for the select box.
options
Options which can be selected by the user.

The current value (selected values) of the select box.

get_names()¶

Returns the names of all selected options as a list.

class cba.components.Table(columns, label=None, selected=None, *args, **kwargs)¶

A HTML table

columns
A list of strings which represent the header of the table.
data
A list of list which represents the rows and columns of the table.
clear()¶

Deletes all rows of the table.

class cba.components.TableRow(handler=None, *args, **kwargs)¶

Represents a table.

handler
The method which is called when the button is clicked.
class cba.components.TableColumn(handler=None, *args, **kwargs)¶

Represents a table column.

class cba.components.Tab(id=None, attributes=None, css_class=None, handler=None, initial_components=None, *args, **kwargs)¶

The container component for tab item.

class cba.components.TabItem(title='', active=False, *args, **kwargs)¶

A tab item.

active
If true the tab item is displayed.
title
The title of the tab item.
class cba.components.TextArea(label=None, value='', error=None, rows=10, *args, **kwargs)¶

A HTML Textarea

error
The current validation error of the text area.
label
An optional label of the text area.
rows
The amount of rows of the text area.
.
value
The current value of the text area.
clear()¶

Sets the value an error to empty strings..

class cba.components.TextInput(id=None, value='', label=None, placeholder=None, error=None, handler=None, icon=None, icon_position='left', *args, **kwargs)¶

An HTML text input.

error
The current validation error of the text input.
icon
An optional icon of the text input, see http://semantic-ui.com/elements/icon.html for more.
icon_position
The position of the icon (one of left or right).
label
An optional label of the text input.
placeholder
The optional placeholder of the text input. If given it is displayed within the input field.
value
The current value of the text input.
clear()¶

Sets the value and error messages to empty strings.
